name: Spot the Signal
description: Spot the Signal is a video game that provides players with first person experiences as people living with depression. Based on a large amount of research and real stories, this game explores psychological and physical influences of depression. Through the rich stories and choices, this game aims to reduce stigma against people with mental disorders, making healthy people more empathetic and understanding. At the same time, the game identifies the warning signs of suicide and depression so that friends, family, and even strangers can offer effective help in time.
